CDP ReportingAdobe Sustainable Development Goals
Guided by sustainable 
development goals.
Developed in 2015, the United 
Nations Sustainable Development 
Goals (SDGs) are centered around 
promoting sustainable, equitable, 
and universal growth. 
The 17 goals are meant to guide the actions of all key 
players, including governments, civil society, and 
businesses. To do our part, Adobe has prioritized five 
goals, which best align with our company’s core business 
and expertise. Through continued and new initiatives, 
Adobe will help reach the targets set out by the SDGs. 
To learn more about our goals and how our programs 
and actions contribute to the SDGs, please see Adobe  
Alignment to the SDGs .
